t = int(raw_input())
while(t > 0):
    n = int(raw_input())
    A = {}
    while(n > 0):
        temp = raw_input()
        name, vote = temp.split()
        present = False
        for k in A.keys():
            if(k == name):
                present = True
                A[k] = vote
        if(not present):
            A[name] = vote
        n = n - 1
    res = 0
    for k in A.keys():
        if(A[k] == '+'):
            res += 1
        elif(A[k] == '-'):
            res -= 1
    print res
    t = t - 1
